results.name: Row of Zorach additive triangle in which n appears (or 0 in the unlikely event that it does not).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Haskell programs for sequences in connection with Zorach additive triangle
example: a(8)=6 since 8 appears in the sixth row.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 07 2002
